articles.content: TCS has announced the launch of a Covid-19 Testing and Vaccine Management Suite that streamlines every stage of the end-to-end testing and vaccination journey, enabling more individuals to get tested… [+3252 chars]

articles.title: IRCTC Share Price: This Multibagger stock soars to near life-time highs! You can make money from it too, ch... - Zee Business
articles.description: IRCTC Share Price: The Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) share price today opened 2.25 per cent higher at Rs 1,928.55 levels, which is near its life-time high of Rs 1,988 per stock.
